creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: blue vest with open front; tie in center; faintly stitched diamond pattern on blue fabric; blue and white stitched panels in a diamond pattern at PR and PL sides and on PR shoulder; small ivory colored button sewn into PR shoulder
markings: PR interior, at bottom: Murray Collection label: JAP 6077
title: Sled-hauling vest (sorihiki happi) made in Shōnai, Yamagata Prefecture
